greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number A(n,k) of rooted trees with n nodes where each node has at most k children; square array A(n,k), n>=0, k>=0, read by antidiagonals.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Antidiagonals n = 0..140, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, t, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1,
b(n-i*j, i-1, t-j, k), j=0..min(t, n/i))))
mathematica: b[n_, i_, t_, k_] := b[n, i, t, k] = If[n == 0, 1, If[i<1, 0, Sum[Binomial[ b[i-1, i-1, k, k]+j-1, j]*b[n-i*j, i-1, t-j, k], {j, 0, Min[t, n/i]}]]];
Table[A[n, d-n], {d, 0, 14}, {n, 0, d}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jun 04 2018, from Maple *)
program: def b(n, i, t, k): return 1 if n==0 else 0 if i<1 else sum([binomial(b(i-1, i-1, k, k)+j-1, j)*b(n-i*j, i-1, t-j, k) for j in range(min(t, n//i)+1)])
def A(n, k): return 1 if n==0 else b(n-1, n-1, k, k)
for d in range(15): print([A(n, d-n) for n in range(d+1)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 02 2018, after Maple code
xref: Main diagonal gives A000081 for n>0.
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Feb 01 2018
